entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pemberton

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
